com.bmc.arsys.qual

Class ARAssignFormatter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bmc.arsys.qual.Formatter
      • com.bmc.arsys.qual.ARAssignFormatter

  • public class ARAssignFormatter
extends Formatter
    Extend from formater class to share common formating code with qual formater.
